fields.tooltipString:
@dictGold Opalvein 
@rin

@dictBlue 2% Chance to cast level 15 Flame Wave on attack
+10% Faster Cast Rate
All Resistances +@dictLightBlue(6-8)@dictBlue
+@dictLightBlue(1-3)@dictBlue Life after each Kill
+@dictLightBlue(1-3)@dictBlue to Mana after each Kill

1 of the following:
+@dictLightBlue(20-40)@dictBlue% Enhanced Damage
+@dictLightBlue(3-5)@dictBlue% to Poison Skill Damage
+@dictLightBlue(3-5)@dictBlue% to Lightning Skill Damage
+@dictLightBlue(3-5)@dictBlue% to Magic Skill Damage
+@dictLightBlue(3-5)@dictBlue% to Fire Skill Damage
+@dictLightBlue(3-5)@dictBlue% to Cold Skill Damage
